io.sarl.sre.spaces

Class AbstractEventSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.SRESpecificDataContainer
      • io.sarl.sre.spaces.AbstractSpace
        • io.sarl.sre.spaces.AbstractEventSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventSpace, Space, SpaceWithParticipants

    public abstract class AbstractEventSpace
extends AbstractSpace
implements EventSpace, SpaceWithParticipants
    Abstract implementation of an event space.
    Version:
    0.12.0-SNAPSHOT 2020-06-30 17:45:08
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Nicolas Gaud, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin

      • registerToSpace

        protected final def registerToSpace(entity : EventListener,
                                    weakParticipant : boolean) : Address 
        Description copied from class: AbstractEventSpace
        Register the specified entity on this space
        Parameters:
        entity - - the entity to be registered
        weakParticipant - - boolean specifying if the specified entity may prevent the space from the destruction if it is the only remaining entity within this space. A Weak participant will not prevent the space from begin destroyed if it is the only one staying in it, a Strong participant will prevent it. A space containing only Weak participants will be destroyed by the SRE Kernel

      • unregisterFromSpace

      • emit

        public final def emit(eventSource : UUID,
                      event : Event,
                      scope : Scope<Address>) : void 
        Description copied from interface: EventSpace
        Emits the event inside this space with the given scope. Only agents matching the scope will receive the event.

        This function does not change the source of the event if it was set.

        If the given event has no specified source, the emit function uses the eventSource parameter to set the source's address.

        Specified by:
        emit in interface EventSpace
        Parameters:
        eventSource - the sender of the event.
        event - the event to emit in the space.
        scope - the definition of the list of receivers of the event.

      • emitLocally

        protected def emitLocally(event : Event,
                          scope : Scope<? super Address>) : void 
        Description copied from class: AbstractEventSpace
        Do the emission of the event.

        This function emits the event only on the internal event bus of the listeners.

        This function launch a task for each matching listener.

        Parameters:
        event - the event to emit.
        scope - description of the scope of the event, i.e. the receivers of the event.

      • isPseudoEmpty

        @Pure
public def isPseudoEmpty(id : UUID) : boolean 
        Description copied from interface: Space
        Replies if the space is empty or the given identifier is associated to the only one participant to the space. Weak participants are ignored by this function.
        Specified by:
        isPseudoEmpty in interface Space
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier to test.
        Returns:
        true if space if empty or the identifier is associated to the only one participant.
